claim.text: Social media users share statistics about recent policy changes without full context

post_content.heading: FACT-CHECK: Social media users share statistics about recent policy changes without full context
post_content.body:
Our fact-checking analysis shows: The core claim has some truth but important context is missing. The situation is more nuanced than presented.

Detailed reasoning: While the basic facts are accurate, the claim oversimplifies a complex situation. Additional context from multiple sources shows the full picture is more balanced.
